Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

In a message dated 4/11/03 2:02:30 AM Central Daylight Time, 
EmprzAnastazia@... writes:


> Still in a state similar to unconsciousness, her form twitched a couple 
> times as it continued the repairs. Nothing simple considering part of her 
> form was organic. 
> 
> In her meta-processor... it raced.. as though like a dream. Again.. she 
> twitched. 
> 
> After a time of silence, her optics shot open. Then she shot upright then 
> gasped as though coming up for air like a human underwater too long. For a 
> moment she was in a daze. 
> 

Still in the daze, her optics glanced about. Then glanced at her damaged 
body; it looked horrific. She still felt low on power/weak. She hated the 
feeling. 

Opening her internal com, though somewhat damaged, "Perceptor.... I need 
your... assistance.... immediately," she stated softly. 

As she waited for Perceptor, her optics then noticed Hydras nearby. It calmed 
her lasercore to know he was still functioning. 

--part1_118.21e2b5e7.2bca4e29_boundary
